availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis M. Helveti (1st ky cavalry and professor)

body.p: Kentucky soldier and professor. Major and lieutenant colonel in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from October 28, 1861, to December 31, 1864. Professor of Modern Languages at A&M College of Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 2-3.
Find A Grave, "LTC Francis M. Helveti (1825-1894)," Memorial #776904, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/776904 (accessed October 9, 2018).
